radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral hydroureteronephrosis and thickened urinary bladder wall.
Bilateral hydronephrosis, bladder trabeculations, an irregular bladder contour, and a thickened bladder wall.
Progression of vesicoureteral reflux to grade 4 and a trabeculated urinary bladder contour.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression of vesicoureteral reflux from grade 3 on the left side (age 7) to grade 4.
